item.description:
Hi there!

Just wanted to invite you to a Japan America mingling event this Friday.
We will be serving home-cooked meal by Japanese (the best food in any Boston event!) with wine/beer buffet style.
Anybody who is 21 and up are welcome.
We’ll have a guest koto player; Sumie Kaneko is not an ordinary/traditional but an innovative/creative player! She studied jazz at Berklee.
Bring your friends and let’s have fun!

JREX is a non-profit organization to support Japanese entrepreneurs in New England.
This event is a casual event for anybody who is interested in making friends in the Japan – America gathering.
Please RSVP(yoyaku) at JREX web site below to attend this event.

Hope to see you there!!

Details are found at: http://xoops.jrex.us/...
item.name: JREX Mingling Event
